sentences: Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Akụkọ
Egwuregwu
Ihe nkiri
Nke ka ewuewu
Okechukwu Anthony Chukwu ekweghi ka ọrụsị ya nọchiere ya ụzọ n'ịgba mbọ.
Ọ bụkwa onye na-enye ndị ọrụsị ibe ya aka ịmụta ọrụ aka iji nye onwe ha nri kama ịnọ n'ụzọ arịọ arịrịọ.
Lee nwagbọghọ ji otu ụkwụ agba egwu
Nwoke kwere ka agwọ 200 taa ya iji chọta ọgwụ agwọ maka mbaụwa
Lee ihe ọ gwara BBC Igbo mgbe anyị na ya kparịtụrụ.
Ndị rụrụ ya bụ onyoonyo bụ Chiagozie Nwonwu na Vining Ogu
